Name: Alanine
Notes: Used in organ creation (modifiers 0-3 create alpha sensors

Name: Cysteine
Notes: Promoter for mouths/slope/trail sensors; Modifier for same organs as A

Name: Aspartic acid
Notes: Used as modifier (same as A/C)

Name: Glutamic acid
Notes: Used as modifier (same as A/C/D)

Name: Phenylalanine
Notes: Used as modifier (creates vampire mouths with K/C promoters)

Name: Glycine
Notes: Used as modifier (same as F - vampire mouths)

Name: Histidine
Notes: Promoter for storage/chiral/poison organs; Modifier for vampire mouths

Name: Isoleucine
Notes: Used as modifier (alpha magnitude sensors with V/M; enablers with K/C; pairing sensors with H/Q)

Name: Lysine
Notes: Promoter for mouths/enablers/clocks/sine generators (alpha/green variant); Modifier for same as I

Name: Leucine
Notes: Promoter for propellers/enablers/trail sensors; Modifier for agent sensors

Name: Methionine
Notes: Promoter for sensors/displacers/slope/trail (same as V); Modifier for beta sensors/displacers

Name: Asparagine
Notes: Used as modifier (same as M - beta sensors/displacers)

Name: Proline
Notes: Promoter for propellers/enablers/trail sensors (same as L); Modifier as N

Name: Glutamine
Notes: Promoter for storage/chiral/poison (same as H); Modifier as N

Name: Arginine
Notes: Used as modifier (beta sensors with V/M; clocks with K/C; chiral flippers with H/Q)

Name: Serine
Notes: Used as modifier (same as R)

Name: Threonine
Notes: Used as modifier (beta magnitude sensors with V/M; sine generators with K/C; chiral flippers with H/Q)

Name: Valine
Notes: Promoter for sensors/displacers/slope/clock/sine (same as M); Modifier as T

Name: Tryptophan
Notes: Used as modifier (energy sensors with V/M; sine generators with K/C; chiral flippers with H/Q)

Name: Tyrosine
Notes: Used as modifier (agent beta sensors with V/M; sine generators with K/C; chiral flippers with H/Q)
